title: Homepage Loads Correctly with Featured Courses and Bundles
description: Verify the Homepage displays featured courses, bundles, testimonials, blog highlights, and FAQ previews correctly on desktop and mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the Homepage.
Check featured courses are displayed with correct titles, images, and links.
Verify course bundles appear with correct discount information and CTAs.
Confirm testimonials, blog highlights, and FAQ preview sections load and display content.
Validate responsive design and accessibility compliance of all elements.

title: Course Catalog Filtering and Navigation
description: Ensure advanced filtering options on Course Catalog work correctly and users can navigate to individual course or bundle pages.

steps.description: Open the Course Catalog page.
Apply filters such as category, price range, difficulty, and rating.
Verify the course list updates dynamically according to applied filters.
Click on an individual course to open its Course Details page.
Validate navigation to the correct course details with full content loaded.
Return to catalog and click on a course bundle.
Verify navigation to bundle details page with all relevant information.

title: Course Details Rendering and Interaction
description: Verify Course Details page loads intro video, syllabus, instructor bio, reviews, FAQs, and bundle integration correctly.

steps.description: Access a Course Details page from the catalog.
Check the intro video loads and plays correctly.
Validate the syllabus sections appear correctly and expand/collapse as expected.
Confirm the instructor bio section is shown with accurate details.
Verify student reviews and ratings are displayed and pagination or loading more works.
Ensure course-specific FAQs are visible and expandable.
Confirm any linked bundles include the current course and pricing details.

title: Payment Processing for Single Course Purchase
description: Test the payment page processes a single course purchase securely via supported payment methods with coupon application.

steps.description: From a course details page, click Enroll Now.
Check navigation to the Payment Page with correct course and price details.
Enter valid payment information using Stripe payment method.
Apply a valid coupon code and verify discount is applied.
Submit the payment.
Verify payment success confirmation and redirection to Student Dashboard.

title: Payment Page Bulk Purchase with Corporate Package
description: Validate corporate bulk purchases including bulk enrollment, various payment options, and coupon application.

steps.description: Navigate to Company Packages page.
Select a corporate learning package and begin checkout process.
Confirm bulk user enrollment inputs are accepted with validation for number of employees.
Choose PayPal as payment method.
Apply a valid corporate coupon code.
Submit payment.
Verify payment success notification and enrollment confirmation emails are sent.
Check that enrolled employees appear in Company Dashboard with assigned courses.

title: Student Dashboard Displays Enrolled Courses and Progress
description: Verify that after purchase, students access their dashboard displaying course overview, progress bars, certificates, and personalized recommendations.

steps.description: Log in as a student who has successfully enrolled in courses.
Confirm list of enrolled courses shows accurate titles and progress percentages.
Verify access to earned certificates and options for viewing and downloading.
Validate personalized course recommendations based on enrolled courses.

title: Course Player Loads and Functions Correctly
description: Test the immersive course player loads all content types including lessons, labs, assignments, quizzes, notes, Q&A, reviews, and FAQs correctly.

steps.description: Access a course player as a student enrolled in the course.
Verify lesson content loads properly including text and embedded media.
Interact with labs and assignments for input and submission.
Complete quizzes and verify scoring functionality.
Add notes and check persistence.
Post a question in the student Q&A section.
Verify the question appears and instructor responses are visible.
Check accessibility and responsiveness of the player.

title: Certificate Generation and Download after Course Completion
description: Ensure certificates are automatically generated upon course completion and available for viewing, downloading as PDFs, and social sharing.

steps.description: Complete all required sections of a course.
Verify certificate is generated and appears in the Student Dashboard Certificates section.
Open the certificate detail view.
Check the certificate can be downloaded as a PDF without errors.
Use the social sharing feature to share the certificate.
Confirm successful sharing to LinkedIn or other supported social platforms.

title: Bundles Catalog Display and Checkout
description: Verify the Bundles Catalog lists curated course bundles correctly with dynamic discount rules and enables smooth checkout.

steps.description: Navigate to Bundles Catalog page.
Check bundles display with correct course listings and discount information.
Select a bundle and initiate checkout.
Verify the checkout page reflects the bundle pricing and discount rules.
Complete payment with a valid payment method.
Confirm success and enrollment in all courses in the bundle.

title: Company Dashboard Employee Management and Progress Tracking
description: Test that company admins can manage employees, assign courses/bundles, and monitor detailed learning progress analytics.

steps.description: Log in as a company admin user.
Access the Company Dashboard and employee management section.
Add a new employee to the company account.
Assign one or more courses or bundles to the employee.
Verify assignments reflect in employeeâ€™s progress overview.
View corporate learning analytics reports.
Confirm detailed reports accurately reflect enrollments, completions, and progress statistics.

title: Instructor Dashboard Content Creation and Management
description: Validate that instructors can create, edit, and manage courses including uploading course content and responding to student reviews.

steps.description: Log in as an instructor.
Access the Instructor Dashboard and create a new course.
Upload detailed course content including syllabus, lessons, and assignments.
Verify content is saved and visible for preview.
Respond to a student review posted on the course.
Confirm instructor response is visible to students.

title: Admin Dashboard and Role-Based Access Control
description: Ensure role-based access properly restricts or permits access to dashboards and features for students, instructors, company admins, and super admins.

steps.description: Log in as a student user.
Confirm Student Dashboard is accessible, and instructor/company/admin features are restricted.
Log in as an instructor.
Verify access to Instructor Dashboard and denial of admin or company features.
Log in as a company admin.
Confirm access to Company Dashboard and no access to instructor or super admin features.
Log in as a super admin.
Verify full access to Admin Dashboard and management features.

title: Admin Course Approval Workflow
description: Test the workflow for admins to review, approve, reject, unpublish, and delete courses through the Admin Dashboard.

steps.description: Log in as a super admin and navigate to Admin Courses management.
Select a pending course submission.
Review course details and content.
Approve the course.
Verify course status updates to Approved and becomes live.
Reject a different pending course with reason.
Confirm status is Rejected and instructor is notified.
Unpublish a live course.
Ensure course is no longer visible in catalog but remains in admin view.
Delete a course.
Confirm course is removed from the platform and database.

title: Admin Analytics Reports Accuracy
description: Verify that admin analytics and reporting components display accurate aggregated data for revenue, user growth, course performance, and employee learning statistics.

steps.description: Log in as a super admin.
Navigate to Admin Reports Dashboard.
Check total revenue figures for the current period match payment records.
Validate user growth charts reflect accurate registrations and active users.
Confirm course performance metrics such as completion rates and ratings are correct.
Verify employee learning analytics for corporate accounts show up-to-date progress.

title: Admin Management of Bundles and Pricing
description: Ensure admins can create, edit, and delete course bundles with special pricing and dynamic discount rules through the Admin Dashboard.

steps.description: Log in as a super admin.
Navigate to Bundle Management.
Create a new bundle by selecting courses and applying discount rules.
Verify bundle appears in Bundles Catalog with correct courses and pricing.
Edit the bundle to update pricing and included courses.
Check that edits are saved and reflected across the platform.
Delete a bundle.
Confirm removal from catalog and no longer available for purchase.

title: Admin FAQ and Blog Content Management
description: Validate the ability for admins to manage FAQs and blog posts including creation, editing, deletion, and correct display on public-facing pages.

steps.description: Log in as a super admin.
Navigate to FAQ Management and create a new FAQ entry.
Verify new FAQ appears on public FAQ section.
Edit an existing FAQ and save changes.
Confirm updated FAQ content is reflected immediately.
Delete a FAQ item.
Ensure the FAQ is removed from public view.
Navigate to Blog Management and create a new post with images and text.
Verify blog post displays correctly on the blog listing and detail pages.
Edit and delete blog posts and verify changes.

title: UI Accessibility and Responsive Design Verification
description: Verify that UI components across the platform adhere to accessibility standards and render correctly on desktop and mobile devices.

steps.description: Access various pages (Homepage, Course Catalog, Dashboard, Payment Page) on desktop.
Ensure UI elements are keyboard navigable and screen-reader friendly.
Check color contrast and font sizes meet accessibility guidelines.
Repeat verification of all above pages on mobile viewport and different screen sizes.
Confirm complete responsiveness and proper layout adaptation.
